name: Spellcasting Aptitude Test
description:
In a world of wizardry and conjuration, the best high schools are hard to get into. These three wizards: fire, galaxy and poison, will give it their all to pass. Enter the Troublesome Environment of Spell Trials and ace it!

Each wizard has a unique attack pattern to aid them in battle. Level them all up to win, but don't send off the ones you need too early!

This game was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2019.
